message: I understand that but like I said it's not a solution for everyone but it will work for some and some is better than none. it's a discussion with the employer to arrange working an hour extra each day to be able to have that day off so it doesn't count as a vacation day. Again, not saying it's the solution for everyone but I know there are employers out there that would be willing to work with their employees. If a particular employer refuses that is unfortunate for them and their employees but if employers can start a trend of working with their employees to improve their situation a whole lot more than just childcare will change for the better.
